DefaultPipe Class Reference
[Hierarchical graphics library]

#include <DefaultPipe.h>

Inheritance diagram for DefaultPipe:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Render scene to rendering target using specified shader technique.


Public Member Functions

 DefaultPipe (PipeSetup *setup, const NS(lang, String)&name="Default", int minpriority=-100, int maxpriority=100)
 Inits resources needed by the pipeline.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DefaultPipe::DefaultPipe ( PipeSetup *  setup,
const NS(lang, String)&  name = "Default",
int  minpriority = -100,
int  maxpriority = 100 
) [explicit]

Inits resources needed by the pipeline.

Parameters:
setup Rendering setup which is shared between all pipes.
name Name of the shader technique to be used. Default is "Default".
minpriority Minimum priority shader which this pipe renders.
maxpriority Maximum priority shader which this pipe renders.
Exceptions:
GraphicsException 

Member Function Documentation

void DefaultPipe::render ( NS(gr, Texture)*  target,
NS(gr, Context)*  context,
Scene *  scene,
Camera *  camera 
) [virtual]

Renders scene to specified rendering target using this pipeline.

Parameters:
target Rendering target or 0 if back buffer should be used.
context Rendering target context.
scene Scene to be rendered.
camera Scene camera to use in rendering.

Implements Pipe.
